title: Border, late 16th–early 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: grid of laid cords with needle lace, reticella style; edge of punto in aria
provenance: ex-collection: Ida Schiff and Frances Morris
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Small squares making up a border with small-scale triangular pendants. Modes: brides picotées, portes.
